scripts.deploy:structured-log: gcloud functions deploy worker-structured-log --entry-point STRUCTURED_LOG --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-http --region europe-west1
scripts.deploy:error-log: gcloud functions deploy worker-error-log --entry-point ERROR_LOG --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-http --region europe-west1
scripts.deploy:image-processing: gcloud functions deploy worker-image-processing --entry-point IMAGE_PROCESSING --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-http --region europe-west1
scripts.deploy:download-file: gcloud functions deploy worker-download-file --entry-point DOWNLOAD_FILE --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-http --region europe-west1
scripts.deploy:generate-svg: gcloud functions deploy worker-generate-svg --entry-point GENERATE_SVG --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-http --region europe-west1
